Description: Semi-circular toilet-box; sides composed of acacia wood and ebony strips; two tinted ivory knobs.
Curator's comments: Published: Un Arte per la Belleza, Padua 1984, p. 51 [65] = Un Arte per la Belleza, Lugano 1984, p. 49 [110].
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2012 July -September, Tokyo, Mori museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2012, October - November, Fukuoka Museum of Art, The Book of the Dead 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
